Cell.Data: Text surounded by {} or [] are special tags for code. These tag will be replaced with other text eg: the name of a player. The tags should NOT be localized. They represent the place in the sentens for their replacing string. Some {} tags start with STR or INT. STR means it will be replaced with text, INT means it will be replaced with a numerical value
终极毒株秘密行动建筑群
Landmark sector name specific for the 'Infested World' planet / world template. It replaces the names for the XENOLAB sectors in SectorNames_Landmarks.xml

Name of a custom spawner structure - like the 'Hopperhound Spanwer' and other 'Spawners' found in 'SectorDefinitions_Strategic.xml'.
An infestuous nest of Xenoplague creatures corrupting this world.[br/]If neglected, the creatures will attack nearby colonies and armies.
异星疫病巢穴是腐蚀这个世界的异星疫病生物的巢穴。[br/]如果放任不管，这些生物将会攻击附近的殖民地和军队。
Description of a custom spawner structure - like the 'Hopperhound Spanwer' and other 'Spawners' found in 'SectorDefinitions_Strategic.xml'.
A.I.V.A. suggested that locating the source of the outbreak gives us access to powerful Xenoplague technology. [br/][br/]We are looking for a secret complex hidden in a fungal forest.
A.I.V.A. 建议，确定疫情爆发的源头可以让我们获得强大的异星疫病技术。[br/][br/]我们正在寻找隐藏在真菌森林中的秘密建筑群。
Another Commander cleared the secret complex before you!
另一名指挥官在你之前已经清理了秘密建筑群！

Planetfall successful, Commander. Readings indicate that this planet was the site of aggressive Xenoplague experimentation prior to an uncontrolled outbreak.[br/][br/]Star Union population fled and quarantined this planet.
行星着陆成功，指挥官。侦测结果显示，在疫情失控之前，这个星球曾是进行侵略性异星疫病实验的地方。[br/][br/]星际联盟的人们逃离了这个星球并将其隔离了起来。
Story message. Speaker: AIVA (female tutorial AI)

Scans suggest the source of the outbreak could be a complex hidden deep within the fungal forests on this planet.[br/][br/]Obtaining control of the complex would grant us a wealth of Xenoplague technology and insights in what might have caused the outbreak, Commander.
扫描显示，这次疫情爆发的源头可能来自一个隐藏在星球真菌森林深处的建筑群。[br/][br/]指挥官，控制建筑群将使我们获得丰富的异星疫病技术，并让我们深入了解疫情爆发的原因。
Story message. Speaker: AIVA (female tutorial AI)

Excellent work, Commander. Our forces found that a short circuited DNA Sequencer caused the loss of control over the Xenoplague test subjects. [br/][br/]Restoring the Sequencer has given us control over some Xenoplague subjects before it disintegrated beyond repair.
干得漂亮，指挥官。我们的部队发现，是一个短路的DNA定序器导致异星疫病实验体失去了控制。[br/][br/]我们得在定序器彻底崩溃前将其修复，从而控制一些异星疫病实验体。
Story message. Speaker: AIVA (female tutorial AI)
